fullExample:
Currently, we face a serious bottleneck in the expense approval process. The current flow depends on manual emails which frequently get lost.

This results in delays of up to 5 business days for simple reimbursements. The finance team spends about 15 hours weekly just chasing managers.

We need a system that centralizes requests and automatically notifies those responsible, eliminating manual work and reducing cycle time to less than 24 hours.
